sentences.sContent: People rose up against the despotic rule of their potentate .
sentences.sContent_eng: People rose up against the despotic rule of their potentate .
sentences.sCn: 人们起来反抗君主的专制统治。

synos.tran: 统治者，君主；有权势的人

remMethod.val: pot(有力的) + ent + ate(人) → 有力量的人 → 统治者

words.tran: 有效的；强有力的，有权势的；有说服力的

trans.tranOther: a ruler in the past, who had great power over his people
